ygData.subject: Matlab toolbox under linux
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all, I ve already installed Cantera under Linux(Mandrake 10.0), and it s work fine in C++, python and g77. Now I m tryning to install also the Cantera

Dear all,

I've already installed Cantera under Linux(Mandrake 10.0), and it's work 
fine in C++, python and g77. Now I'm tryning to install also the Cantera 
matlab toolbox
(I have the last Matlab version 7.0.0).

The compilation works fine (make), but during the installion as root, 
I've obtained
this error message:

make[1]: Entering directory 
`/home/michele/dottorato/chimica/cantera/cantera-1.5.4/Cantera/matlab'
/usr/bin/install -c -d /usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera
/usr/bin/install -c -d /usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera-demos
/usr/bin/install -c -d /usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@ThermoPhase/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@Kinetics/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@Transport/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@Interface/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d /usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@Solution
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@XML_Node/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@Reactor/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@ReactorNet/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@Wall/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@FlowDevice/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/@Func/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d /usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/1D
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/1D/@Domain1D/private
/usr/bin/install -c -d 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera/1D/@Stack/private
cd cantera; /usr/bin/install -c *.m *.mexglx 
/usr/local/matlab/toolbox/cantera/cantera
/usr/bin/install: impossibile fare stat di `*.mexglx': No such file or 
directory
make[1]: *** [install] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory 
`/home/michele/dottorato/chimica/cantera/cantera-1.5.4/Cantera/matlab'
make: *** [matlab-install] Error 2

Before to run the compilation and the install process, I've set the 
matlab compiler:

mex -setup

using the 2nd options (gcc compiler).

Thanks in advance for your help.

Michele
